title: Sweet Lies: Alternate Ending
description: Finding a note from my girlfriend saying she’s leaving me wasn’t what I thought I’d walk into when I came home that day. Truthfully, I can’t blame her. It was my fault. Secrets and lies have been sprinkled through our relationship for years.But I’m not ready to let Jessa go. Walking away isn’t an option. Convinced by my best friend to fight for my girl, I do just that. Though, I’m not ready for the hidden truths that come to light.
author: Melony Ann
